_header: Of all the ways that I know by east or by west
Note:
Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 177.
_description: An English translation of the ‘Semita Recta’ of Albertus Magnus on the Elixir — thirty-two couplets

CamTCC915.First Lines:
Off all þe weys þat I knowe be est or be westeEuere holde
                    I þis path for on of þe beste…
CamTCC915.Last Lines:
…Half on vnce & {dram} of erucaem þertoAnd Ioyne hem
                    all to geder so
